text:
GRADUATE SCHOOL
OFFICE OF THE DEAN
CASE INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY
UNIVERSITY CIRCLE
CLEVELAND 6, OHIO
21 January 1957
Mr. Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
University of Illinois
119 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mr. Skornia:
In reply to your letter of January 17th, I am
attaching copies of two preliminary reports which have
been prepared by Professor John Martin concerning the
two-way closed circuit TV experiment which we have
under way. We anticipate that further experimenting
will be carried on during the second semester and will
be glad to send you further reports as the work
progresses.
I am not familiar with the Fact Sheets in
Educational Television and would be pleased to have a
set.
Sincerely
Elmer Hutchisson
Dean
EH/ IC
